summary: Page 20 (book page מ) contains sections מח through נד. Section numbering is correct and sequential. However, sections נב and נד have '[?]' markers and '...' indicating incomplete OCR capture. The continues_to metadata may be incorrect.

issues.description: The OCR text reads 'אר"י [?] ... אוכל פירותיהן בעוה"ז וכו' ואלו הן וכו' והשכמת ביהמ"ד וכו''. The '[?]' and '...' indicate the OCR could not read parts of the text. The full makor text should be captured without placeholder markers.
issues.original_text: אר"י [?] ... אוכל פירותיהן בעוה"ז וכו' ואלו הן וכו' והשכמת ביהמ"ד וכו'.
issues.corrected_text: Needs re-OCR - text not properly captured

issues.description: Same issue as section נב - the OCR text reads 'אר"י [?] ... אוכל פירותיהן בעוה"ז וכו' ואלו הן וכו' והמגדל בניו לת"ת וכו''. The '[?]' and '...' indicate incomplete OCR.
The OCR reads 'מניח עצמו לידי חיוב' which may actually be 'מכניס עצמו לידי חיוב' (puts himself into obligation).
Source ref reads 'אגדות מהרי"ט עירובין דף של"ב'. The daf number של"ב (332) seems very high for a Talmudic tractate. May be a different number or a page reference in the sefer rather than the Gemara.

The continues_to shows section_letter 'נד' but the flag is false, which is contradictory. Looking at the image, section נד appears complete on this page. The continues_to should either have flag:true or section_letter:null.
issues.corrected_text: Should be {flag: false, section_letter: null, level: null}
